description: This file defines a UI component called 'Button' using LightningJS framework, including its template, state, and input handling.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the HTML-like template for the Button component, with conditional text based on component state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initial state of the component, managing whether the button is favorited and the corresponding texts.

methods.name: input
methods.description: Handles user input; specifically toggles the 'isFavorited' state on the 'enter' action.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Input handler that toggles the 'isFavorited' boolean value.
